articles.description: Harry Kane spent the summer telling his England team-mates he planned to leave Tottenham after the European Championship, and he hoped to be a Manchester City player by the time he next set foot in St. George’s Park.

articles.title: Realme Pad India Launch Teased by CEO Madhav Sheth, Will Feature a Slim Design - Gadgets 360
articles.description: Realme India and Europe CEO Madhav Sheth has teased the arrival of the Realme Pad tablet in India. The side profile of the tablet has been teased and it is seen to sport an edge-to-edge finish with a slim profile. It is also teased to be lightweight.

articles.title: New COVID-19 strain: Mandatory RT-PCR test for those arriving in Mumbai from Europe, China, Middle East - Zee News
articles.description: After the discovery of a new strain of the COVID-19 variant C.1.2, the Brihanmumbai Municipal Corporation (BMC) has made the RT-PCR test mandatory for international passengers arriving at the Mumbai airport from September 3.
